spec.name: Villa Paquet Building
spec.description: The Villa Paquet Building (Immeuble Villa Paquet) is a multi-story structure completed in 1952, designed by architect **Jacques Gouyon**. Its architecture reflects the late Modernist and functionalist trends of the post-war era. It is named after the Paquet family or company, reflecting the strong French commercial presence in the city during this period.

timeline.title: Building Completed
timeline.description: The Villa Paquet Building was completed.

access.comment: Building is inhabited; exterior view is public, interior access is restricted to residents/tenants.
